content.question: Which of the following Supreme Court cases is most directly related to the large amount of money spent by outside groups in the 2012 election?

choices.label: New York Times Co. v. United States (1971)
Citizens United v. Federal Election Commission (2010)

content.answer: Citizens United v. Federal Election Commission (2010)

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain what the data implies or illustrates about political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
